verses.verse: Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the Christ <S%G5547><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> one that loves <S%G25><s%> him that begat <S%G1080><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> him also <S%G2532><s%> that is begotten <S%G1080><s%> of him.

By this <S%G5129><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> that we love <S%G25><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and keep <S%G5083><s%> his commandments. <S%G1785><s%>
For this <S%G3778><s%> is the love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that we keep <S%G5083><s%> his commandments: <S%G1785><s%> and his commandments <S%G1785><s%> are not grievous. <S%G926><s%>

For whatever <S%G3956><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> overcomes <S%G3528><s%> the world: <S%G2889><s%> and this <S%G3778><s%> is the victory <S%G3529><s%> that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> even our faith. <S%G4102><s%>
Who <S%G5101><s%> is he that overcomes <S%G3528><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> but he that believes <S%G4100><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is he that came <S%G2064><s%> by water <S%G5204><s%> and blood, <S%G129><s%> even Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> not by water <S%G5204><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but by water <S%G5204><s%> and blood. <S%G129><s%> And it is the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that bears <S%G3140><s%> witness, <S%G3140><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is truth. <S%G225><s%>

For there are three <S%G5140><s%> that bear <S%G3140><s%> record <S%G3140><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> the Word, <S%G3056><s%> and the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%> and these <S%G3778><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> are one. <S%G1520><s%>

And there are three <S%G5140><s%> that bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> in earth, <S%G1093><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and the water, <S%G5204><s%> and the blood: <S%G129><s%> and these <S%G3778><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> agree <S%G1526><s%> in one. <S%G1520><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> we receive <S%G2983><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is greater: <S%G3187><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> is the witness <S%G3141><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he has testified <S%G3140><s%> of his Son. <S%G5207><s%>

He that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> in himself: <S%G1438><s%> he that believes <S%G4100><s%> not God <S%G2316><s%> has made <S%G4160><s%> him a liar; <S%G5583><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he believes <S%G4100><s%> not the record <S%G3141><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G3140><s%> of his Son. <S%G5207><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> is the record, <S%G3141><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> to us eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and this <S%G3778><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> is in his Son. <S%G5207><s%>

He that has <S%G2192><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> and he that has <S%G2192><s%> not the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> not life. <S%G2222><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> things have I written <S%G1125><s%> to you that believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> that you may know <S%G1492><s%> that you have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and that you may believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> is the confidence <S%G3954><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> in him, that, if <S%G1437><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing according <S%G2596><s%> to his will, <S%G2307><s%> he hears <S%G191><s%> us:

And if <S%G1437><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that he hear <S%G191><s%> us, whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> we ask, <S%G154><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> the petitions <S%G155><s%> that we desired <S%G154><s%> of him.

If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man see <S%G1492><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> sin <S%G264><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> which is not to death, <S%G2288><s%> he shall ask, <S%G154><s%> and he shall give <S%G1325><s%> him life <S%G2222><s%> for them that sin <S%G264><s%> not to death. <S%G2288><s%> There is a sin <S%G266><s%> to death: <S%G2288><s%> I do not say <S%G3004><s%> that he shall pray <S%G2065><s%> for it.
All <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> is sin: <S%G266><s%> and there is a sin <S%G266><s%> not to death. <S%G2288><s%>

We know <S%G1492><s%> that whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> sins <S%G264><s%> not; but he that is begotten <S%G1080><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> keeps <S%G5083><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and that wicked <S%G4190><s%> one touches <S%G680><s%> him not.
And we know <S%G1492><s%> that we are of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> lies <S%G2749><s%> in wickedness. <S%G4190><s%>

And we know <S%G1492><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is come, <S%G2240><s%> and has given <S%G1325><s%> us an understanding, <S%G1271><s%> that we may know <S%G1097><s%> him that is true, <S%G228><s%> and we are in him that is true, <S%G228><s%> even in his Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the true <S%G228><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
Little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> from idols. <S%G1497><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
